attributes.action: Give the Chancellor, Alistair Darling the sack following the  loss of two discs containing the personal details of 25 million people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign this petition and show this Government, that we no longer have any faith in our Chancellor, Alistair Darling.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
